thread.title: Saudi- GOIC hosts meeting to discuss GCC nonoil industrial export promotion
thread.title_full: Saudi- GOIC hosts meeting to discuss GCC nonoil industrial export promotion | MENAFN.COM

author: Arab News
title: Saudi- GOIC hosts meeting to discuss GCC nonoil industrial export promotion
text:
(MENAFN - Arab News) The Gulf Organization for Industrial Consulting (GOIC) is hosting a meeting of the technical committee at its headquarters in Doha on Aug. 4 and 5. The secretariat general of the Gulf Cooperation Council (GCC) has convened this meeting of GCC members of the technical committee in charge of the execution of the strategy. Participants will discuss the general framework document and the strategic plan for the development of GCC nonoil industrial exports (2016-2030). 
The meeting will include a presentation of the strategy followed by a discussion of the previous suggestions and remarks of specialized country representatives and experts. This meeting comes after a series of meetings that had previously discussed three stages of the strategy preparation project. 
The objectives of the strategy: Offering an accurate diagnosis of the GCC nonoil industrial exports performance and these industries' ecosystem and challenges means to boost the growth of these exports during a specific period of time how to benefit from global trade rules to support these exports and how to learn from international success stories in boosting industrial exports. 
The strategy also allows for benefiting from GCC integration to promote the growth of these exports boost trade between GCC countries and use the negotiation power of the GCC bloc to increase the accessibility of Gulf nonoil industrial exports to the markets of key partners throughout the globe.
